metadata.title: CVE-2020-12762 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
json-c through 0.14 has an integer overflow and out-of-bounds write via alarge JSON file, as demonstrated by printbuf_memappend.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12762` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjson-c3 - 0.12.1-1.3ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: json-c package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.1-1.3ubuntu0.3').
